General.Name: JC Chemical Co. Ltd
General.Description: JC Chemical Co., Ltd., a renewable energy company, engages in the production and sale of biofuel from vegetable oil or animal fat. It offers bio diesel, bio heavy oil/marine biofuel, glycerin, and palm oil. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Hwa-Seong  Lee
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer, and Managing Director
